title: Letter: A New Kind Of Platform with Dayne and Clyde Rathbone
description:
I spoke with the founders of Letter Clyde and Dayne Rathbone about the inspiration for their platform and why they believe a space for good faith discourse is so needed online. This was a lovely chat, I hope you guys enjoy it 

Try Letter our here: 
https://letter.wiki/login
On twitter: @LetterWiki, @daynerathbone, @ClydeRathbone

Link to voice cloning for text to speech here:
https://lyrebird.ai

Follow me:
twitter: @theother_95
Instagram: @theother95
Facebook: @theother95page
Email me: theotherninetyfive@gmail.com
